items.summary: Add graceful error handling for the final photo in the celebration view: if the photo cannot be loaded, show a small English fallback message in the UI (and avoid layout breaking), and log a clear console warning indicating the missing/failed image path.

Fix the celebration view so the final uploaded photo reliably loads from static assets, using a valid file path under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (and matching the actual filename and extension) rather than a broken/missing reference.
